biotools.summary: Software designed to graphically present genetic information in pedigrees. This information can include phenotypic data, observed marker alleles, calculated Identity by Descent (IBD) probabilities, and (to be added) QTL (Quantitative Trait Loci) allele probabilities.

bioschemas.name: Pedimap
bioschemas.summary: Software designed to graphically present genetic information in pedigrees. This information can include phenotypic data, observed marker alleles, calculated Identity by Descent (IBD) probabilities, and (to be added) QTL (Quantitative Trait Loci) allele probabilities.
